title: Delete product model
content:
This page explains how to delete a product model.

Delete product model

  1. Click    > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Product Models. 
  3. Click the Table view button on the upper-right side of the page.
  4. Select the product model you want to delete.
  5. Click Delete on the toolbar.
  6. Click OK in the Confirm Delete dialog box.
